mainEntity.name: How can I get admission to BTech at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University offers admission to BTech programme based on merit or entrance exam scores. The university considers the Class 12 merit of the aspirants for BTech course. Aspirants with a valid score in JEE Main or CUET are also eligible for BTech admission. Besides, candidates must also complete Class 12 with a minimum of 60% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics for BTech course.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University offer Lateral Entry admission to B.Tech?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Galgotias University does offer lateral entry admission to the BTech programme. Lateral entry admission allows students with a diploma in Engineering or Technology to directly enter the second year or higher semesters of the BTech programme. Here are the details regarding the lateral entry admission process at Galgotias University: Eligibility Criteria Diploma Qualification: Candidates should have completed a three-year diploma in Engineering or Technology from a recognised institution. Relevant Discipline: The diploma should be in a discipline or branch of Engineering that is relevant to the BTech programme in which admission is sought. Minimum Aggregate Percentage: The candidates must have obtained minimum aggregate of 60% in the aggregate or CGPA 6.0 on a 10 point scale. Admission Process: Application: Candidates interested in lateral entry admission to BTech at Galgotias University need to fill out the application form. The form is typically available on the university's official website or can be obtained from the admission office. Counselling and Seat Allotment: Shortlisted candidates will be called for counseling. During counselling, candidates are required to provide necessary documents for verification, such as academic transcripts, diploma certificates, entrance exam scorecards (if applicable), identity proof, etc. Based on the candidate's merit and choice, seats are allotted in the preferred BTech branch. Seat Confirmation and Admission: After the seat is allotted, candidates need to confirm their admission by paying the required fees within the specified timeframe. They must complete all the necessary formalities and submit the required documents as per the university's instructions. It's important to note that the specific details of the lateral entry admission process, eligibility criteria, and entrance exam (if applicable) may vary from year to year.

mainEntity.name: What is the selection criteria for BTech course offered by Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Admission to BTech programme is based on merit in the last qualifying exam.

mainEntity.name: Are admission 2024 open to Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University admissions 2024 are open currently. The university offers UG, PG, Doctoral, Certificates, Diploma and Integrated courses in the fields of Engineering, Business, Law, Arts, Sciences, Media & Communication etc. Eligible candidates can apply online on the official website of Galgotias University.

mainEntity.name: Is Galgotias University good for placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Galgotia University Greater Noida offers good annual placements for various courses like BTech, MBA, MCA, etc. In 2023, over 580 recruiters offered job opportunities. The highest package and average package stood at INR 1.50 crore per annum and INR 5.25 LPA, respectively. Additionally, 32% of offers were multiple job opportunities. The top recruiters of Galgotias University placements 2023 included Microsoft, Amazon, American Express, Commvault, and many other renowned companies.

mainEntity.name: What is the fees for the BTech course at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: The total tuition fee for the BTech course at Galgotias University ranges from INR 1.40 lakh to INR 6 lakh. The duration of the course is between 3-5 years. The university usually conducts GEEE to shortlist candidates for the BTech programme. Candidates who have passed UPSEE/ JEE Main can also apply. Find below the eligibility and selection criteria for BTech courses: Selection criteria: Merit-based Eligibility for BTech/ BTech (Hons): A pass in Class 12 with a minimum of 60% aggregate in Physics/ Chemistry/ Mathematics. Eligibility for BTech in Agriculture Engineering: A pass in Class 12 in PCM/ PCB with at least 60% aggregate.

mainEntity.name: Is there any entrance exam at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: The entrance exam accepted by Galgotias University include JEE Main/ UPSEE/ CLAT/ GMAT/ MAT/ CAT/ GMAT/ CMAT/ NMAT/ CUET. The university conducts Galgotias Engineering Entrance Examination (GEEE) for the BTech course and Galgotias University Management Aptitude Test (GUMAT) for the MBA course. Also, the university is also conducting counselling for CUET-specific courses. Candidates can proceed with the admission process for various UG courses through CUET UG scores by visiting the official website. Apart from the entrance exam candidates also needs to fulfil the eligibility criteria for the specific course.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University accept 12th marks?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Galgotias University inducts candidates for the majority of its courses based on marks in the qualifying examinations. For admission to the UG programmes across various specialisations at Galgotias University candidates will get selected based on their marks in class 12 as the qualifying examination for UG courses is class 12. Hence, candidates seeking admission to the UG courses at Galgotias University must have valid marks in class 12. For admission to BTech and BA LLB, candidates are also selected based on their scores in JEE-Main and CLAT, respectively. Therefore, candidates based on their marks in class 12 or the required entrance examination will be selected for further admission rounds followed by document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment.

mainEntity.name: Can I get direct admission to MCA at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, direct admission is valid for MCA at Galgotias University. Candidates are offered admission based on their merit obtained in the last qualifying exam of degree. There is no requirement to qualify for any entrance exam. Aspirants can apply directly on the admission portal of Galgotias University. They also have to submit their scorecards and marksheet of Class 12 and graduation as a supporting documents of previous education.

mainEntity.name: What are the concepts introduced in the first year of BTech at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: In the first year of the BTech degree at Galgotias University candidates go through the concepts that they've already studies in their Class 11 and Class 12. This is done so that students know the basics of the concepts that they're going to use during their time at the course. The first year also ensures that students coming from different boards are on the same level about necessary concepts required for engineering.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University has a hostel facility?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Galgotias University has a hostel facility both for boys and girls. The campus hostels are surrounded by lush green lawns and playing fields. The hostels have uninterrupted power backup. There are also facilities for indoor games like TT, carom, chess, etc. The management of the hostel is under the control of a warden or hostel in charge. With a sense of community and brotherhood, students have a cosy and comfortable stay. The canteen at the hostel serves students hygienic, high-quality food that has been cooked by chefs with formal training. The hostel mess serves very well, filling meals. The mess accommodates the diverse gastronomic interests of students from various geographical locations. The management, the caterer, and the students work together to plan and oversee the mess menu.

mainEntity.name: What are the facilities provided by Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University provides modern amenities with state-of-the-art infrastructure to its students. The university campus is spread over an area of 52 acres of rolling greens at a prime location on the Yamuna Expressway. The facilities include a fully Wi-Fi campus, Air-conditioned classrooms with audio-visual and multi-media facilities, Well equipped Conference hall and Seminar hall, 24-hour Internet connectivity with 4Mbps bandwidth, Separate Hostels for boys & girls with adequate safety arrangements for girls’ hostel, Tie-up with nearby hospital for OPD and emergencies, laboratories, a library, hostels, cafeterias, etc. Additionally, the university also has indoor and outdoor sports facilities for students.

mainEntity.name: What is the eligibility criteria for BTech admissions at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: The eligibility criteria for BTech admissions at Galgotias University is that candidates should have passed Class 12 with a minimum of 50 - 60% aggregate. Also, Galgotias University conducts Galgotias Engineering Entrance Examination (GEEE) for the BTech programme. The duration of these courses is from 3 to 5 years. Moreover, the fee for the BTech programme ranges between INR 1.44 Lacs - INR 5.40 lakh. Some of the streams of the BTech programme include Computer Science Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, etc.

mainEntity.name: Is Galgotias University good for B.A. LL.B. (Hons)?

acceptedAnswer.text: {Source: B.A. LL.B. (Hons) students & alumni} Based on the reviews and feedback from students and alumni, here's what you need to know: Pros: * Good infrastructure and campus facilities, including a modern library, moot court, and sports amenities. * Helpful and knowledgeable faculty members who are willing to assist students. * Relevant course curriculum that prepares students for the industry. * Opportunities for internships and practical training. * A wide range of extra-curricular activities and events organized by the university. mainEntity.name: What are the perks of studying at Galgotias University?

mainEntity.name: Is it worth to pursue MBA from Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Since the University is considered under a tier 3 tag, obviously there would exist some back draw with it. But, if you are willing to work hard in your respective field, it will definitely be worth it. MBA courses are among some of the demanded courses in the University for post-graduate studies. Students get a lot of related opportunities to make them capable of the current market. University will definitely give you a lot of opportunities, although the placement packages are about 4-5lakh (average & the highest is 13Lakhs) but at last, it just matters how much you are willing to work to the opportunities available. mainEntity.name: Which college is more affordable for B.Sc. among SVSU - Swami Vivekanand Subharti University and Galgotias University?

mainEntity.name: Is B.Sc. at Galgotias University worth the investment?

acceptedAnswer.text: {Source: B.Sc. students & alumni} Based on the reviews from students and alumni, here's a summary: Positive Points: * Good Infrastructure: The university has excellent infrastructure, including well-maintained buildings, modern labs, libraries, and recreational spaces. * Helpful Faculty Members: Teachers are generally supportive, knowledgeable, and helpful, with a strong presence of experts in their fields. * Various Activities and Festivals: The university hosts numerous cultural events, festivals, and extracurricular activities throughout the year, creating a vibrant campus environment. * Placement Opportunities: While placements may vary across departments, some students reported receiving job offers from reputed companies like Amazon, Microsoft, and others. Negative Points: * Limited Job Prospects: Some students expressed concerns about the limited job prospects in certain departments, particularly in fields like forensic sciences where the scope is restricted in India. * High Expectations vs Reality: A few students mentioned feeling let down by the university's promises regarding placements and internships. * Hostel Issues: A few students complained about issues with hostel accommodations, including poor maintenance and lack of transparency regarding rules and regulations. * Exam Stress: Some students found the academic pressure and exam system to be stressful, with strict attendance policies affecting their ability to participate. Verdict: Based on the mixed feedback, it appears that Galgotias University has its strengths and weaknesses. While it excels in terms of infrastructure and faculty support, some areas require improvement. Students interested in pursuing a B.Sc. at Galgotias University should weigh these factors against their own expectations and goals before investing in their education.

mainEntity.name: Is After 10th Diploma at Galgotias University a good choice?

mainEntity.name: Is BCA at Galgotias University a good choice?

acceptedAnswer.text: {Source: BCA students & alumni} Based on the reviews and feedback from current students and alumni, here's a summary of the pros and cons: Pros: * High Placement Rate: Over 70% of students get placed every year, with the highest package being INR 1-2 crore and the average package being INR 2.4 lakhs. * Good Infrastructure: The university has a sprawling campus with Wi-Fi, air-conditioned classrooms, laboratories, and a library. * Knowledgeable Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified, knowledgeable, and supportive. * Relevant Curriculum: The course curriculum is relevant and prepares students for the industry. * Placement Assistance: The university provides 100% placement assistance, although only worthy students with key skills may get placed. Cons: * Limited Facilities: Hostel facilities are average, and some students prefer staying outside due to affordability and better options. * Network Issues: Wi-Fi signals are weak in some areas of the campus. * Event-focused Culture: While events are conducted, some students feel that academics take a backseat. * Low Package Options: While the university claims to place students in top companies, some students reported receiving lower package offers. Additional Insights: * The university has a strong reputation for placements, particularly in the IT sector. * Alumni have reported success in securing jobs at reputed companies like Infosys, HCL, and Wipro. * However, some students felt that the university focuses excessively on events and extracurricular activities, leading to neglect of academic priorities. Overall, considering these points, BCA at Galgotias University seems like a good choice for students seeking a strong foundation in IT and a good placement record. However, individual experiences may vary depending on factors like academic performance, personality, and interests.

mainEntity.name: What is the admission process for BBA at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University BBA admission is entirely merit-based. The admission process for BBA is a three step process. Candidates have to fulfil the minimum eligibility requirements and proceed for the admission. Find below the steps including in the Galgotias University BBA admission process 2024: Application Process: Candidates have to apply online on the official website of the university. They have to pay an application fee of INR 1,100 along with submitting the important documents. Selection Round: Candidates will be selectionbased on their merit of last qualifying exam of Class 12 and a valid CUET UG scores. Further, merit list will be released for the selected candidates. Final Admission: Candidates who qualify the selection process will be allotted seats through a common counselling process conducted at the university. Candidates whose names appeared on the merit list have to pay a certain amount of fee to lock their seats. Note: In case, the seats get filled or students are found non-eligible for the course, the admission counsellor will interview the candidate for the second attempt.

mainEntity.name: Is BPharm costly at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: The BPharm programme at Galgotias University has a total tuition fee of INR 5.2 Lacs which is to be paid over four years. Candidates will have to pay an average tuition fee of INR 1.3 Lacs every year during the course of the programme. The tuition fee might be expensive for some people, therefore candidates can use the scholarships provided by the university to get aid in paying the tuition fee.

mainEntity.name: What is the total fee of BPharma programme offered by Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: The total fee of BPharma is INR 5.26 lakh.

mainEntity.name: Can I get direct admission in Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, students can get direct admission at Galgotias University. Candidates can easily enroll for direct admission to courses such as BCA, BCA, BDes, BSc, etc. Admission to these courses is done based on candidates merit obtained in the last qualifying exam of Class 12. The final selection carries out with document verification process and fee payment that leads to the final seat allotment. However, the university also grants admission to other courses such as MBA, BTech, and others based on national-level entrance exams.

mainEntity.name: How can I get admission in Galgotias University for MBA?

acceptedAnswer.text: Admission to MBA at Galgotias University is based on scores obtained in various national-level entrance exams. Candidates seeking admission to this course must qualify for any one of the following entrance exams: MAT CAT NMAT CMAT CUET-PG Further, a counselling process will be conducted at the university for the final seat allotment. Candidates whose names appeared on the merit list have to pay a certain amount of fee to lock their seat. In case, the seats get filled or students are found non-eligible for the course, the admission counsellor will interview the candidate for the second attempt. However, this information is based on unofficial sources. Candidates are advised to get clarity from the official website or the admission office of Galgotias University.

mainEntity.name: Is CUET exam registration open?

acceptedAnswer.text: Common University Entrance Test (CUET) 2025 registration has commenced at cuet.nta.nic.in. NTA released the CUET 2025 notification. Soon after the release of the notification, the CUET registration 2025 process began online at official website. Candidates willing to appear for the CUET 2025 exam must ensure that they fill out the application form online. CUET 2025 registration will end on March 22, 2025. Further to the last date, candidates will not be able to fill out the CUET application form. No request for extension of CUET registration until the last date will be entertained. Before filling out the application form, candidates must ensure they fulfil the prescribed CUET eligibility criteria to qualify for the entrance exam.

mainEntity.name: Is Galgotias University BBA admission open?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Galgotias University admission process starts with the release of application forms. The admission process for the year 2023 has been completed. Candidates must visit the official website to apply for BBA once the application window gets open for the admission year 2024. Aspirants are advised either to keep checking the official website or the admission office of the university.

mainEntity.name: Can I get admission in Galgotias University for MBA?

acceptedAnswer.text: Although, Galgotias University MBA admission is entirely entrance-based. However, as per the official website, some seats are filled through direct management quota. The university has reserved a few seats for later admission. Candidates who are willing to take admission via Management quota need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria and apply online on the official website. They can also contact directly to the admission counsellor at the admission office. Further, the best time to apply for direct admission is during the counselling process.

mainEntity.name: What kind of scholarships does Galgotias University offer for BA?

acceptedAnswer.text: For the BA programme Galgotias University offers both merit and sports scholarships, the criteria for merit and sports scholarships is as follows: Merit Scholarships: Toppers of all the Board/University - 100% tuition fee waiver Scholarship for students securing 93% aggregate/PCM and above in class 12 or 80% marks or above in graduation - 25% tuition fee waiver For students admitted through CUET (Common University Entrance Test) - 5% Scholarship on tuition fee Sports Scholarships: Candidates who have participated in National and International level tournaments. Candidates can give trials to avail the scholarship

mainEntity.name: Is there any scholarship in Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University provides a total of five scholarships to its meritorious students and students carving their marks in sports, performing arts, and literature. Candidates can get merit scholarships based on academic performance in examinations prescribed by the University i.e. Class 12 or Graduation, Rank/Score in All India/State Level Entrance/ Aptitude Test and candidates possessing exemplary skills in sports, performing arts or literary skills. Similarly, for scholarships from Sports quota, candidates can get Galgotias University admission in two ways Direct Admission without Sports Trials and Admission with Sports Trials. Additionally, the toppers of all the Board/Universities get a 100% tuition fee waiver and the students securing up to 4000th rank in the JEE Examination - a 50% tuition fee waiver. Candidates can click here for more details regarding Galgotias University scholarships.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University offer financial aid to meritorius students of DPharm?

acceptedAnswer.text: The university website does not mention semester scholarships for students who have secured good marks in their evaluations. The university does mention scholarships for students who have secured a good rank in respective entrance exam for admission. DPharma admission take place through the merit secured in Class 12 exams. Therefore, candidates who have topped their board examinations are given 100% fee waiver. Candidates can have a look at the various scholarships that the university provides through the university website.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University provide financial aid for BTech?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Galgotias University provides financial aid to meritorious students in the BTech programme. Candidates who have secured well in the entrance exam or have secured high ranks in their board exams can apply for admission to the university. The university offers varying degrees of financial aid for its BTech programme such as: Toppers of all the Board/University - 100% tuition fee waiver Scholarship for students securing up to 4000th rank in the JEE Examination - 50% tuition fee waiver Scholarship for students securing 93% aggregate/PCM and above in class 12 or 80% marks or above in graduation - 25% tuition fee waiver

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University MBA offer sports scholarships?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Galgotias University offers sports scholarships for candidates who secured positions or have experience in national and international level competitions. As part of the scholarship programme candidates can secure admission into the programme through sports trials given during part of the selection process. Candidates should apply for Sports Quota scholarships if they have a background in sports.

mainEntity.name: Which MCA specialisation does Galgotias University offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University offers a two year MCA course in a full-time mode by the Department of Computer Applications. Apart from the regular MCA, the university also offers industry-oriented MCA programmes in four specialisations. Find them below: MCA ( Industry Oriented Specialisation in Cloud Computing) MCA (Industry Oriented Specialisation in Computer Network & Cyber Security) MCA (Industry Oriented Specialisation in Data Analytics) MCA (Industry Oriented Specialisation in Web Designing & Security)

mainEntity.name: What is the syllabus of CUET?

acceptedAnswer.text: Common Univeristy Entrance Test (CUET) result is released by National Testing Agency. CUET syllabus is divided into three sections viz., Languages, Domain Subject and General Test. CUET language section assesses candidate through reading comprehension (factual, literary, and narrative), literary aptitude and vocabulary. CUET syllabus second section- domain subject assesses the candidate's in depth knowledge on the subject he/she has opted for. CUET third section- general test includes general knowledge, current affairs, general mental ability, quantitative reasoning and logical and analytical reasoning. CUET syllabus is available now. Candidates can check the section wise detailed CUET syllabus here.

mainEntity.name: In which mode does DPharm is offered at Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: DPharm at Galgotias University is provided in the full-time offline mode at the university campus in Greater Noida. This means that classes will take place offline at the university during weekdays and exams will also take place at the university campus. Working professionals won't be able to take up the course on a part-time basis as the course demands certain time commitments necessary for the course.

mainEntity.name: Which MBA specialisations does Galgotias University offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University MBA courses are offered for a duration of either one or two year. The university offers MBA course in total of nine specialisations, along with a separate MBA (Dual Specialisation) course. Find below the duration-wise MBA specialisations offered at Galgotias University: MBA Specialisation (One-year) MBA Specialisation (Two-year) MBA (Dual Specialisation) MBA (Dual Specialisation) Aviation Management Aviation Management Financial Management Logistics & Supply Chain Management Logistics & Supply Chain Management Financial Management Tourism & Travel Management Tourism & Travel Management

mainEntity.name: What are the BTech specialisations offered by Galgotias University?

acceptedAnswer.text: BTech is a four-year course offered in eight major specialisations, including Civil, Mechanical, Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Agriculture, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.

mainEntity.name: Does Galgotias University offer international collaborations or MoUs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Galgotias University provides opportunities for international collaborations and Memorandums of Understanding (MoUs). The university has established MoUs with various renowned international universities. These collaborations facilitate student exchange programmes and enable students to gain international exposure and learning experiences. Below are some of the names of GU International MoUs: Galgotias University International MoUs Purdue University, Calumet Campus, USA University of Arkansas, Fayetteville, USA University of Maryland Kent State University Institute of Accountancy Arusha, Tanzania InterNapa College, Sotira, Cyprus Chifley Business School, Australia Northern Illinois University, USA University of Pisa, Italy

mainEntity.name: What is the ranking of Galgotias University MBA course?

acceptedAnswer.text: Ranking can be an important deciding factor while choosing the best course or college for students. As per the latest ranking trends released for MBA in 2023, the Galgotias University is ranked 91 by NIRF, which got improved from the last year's rank, which was 93 in the year 2022. Futher, the unversity was ranked 148 under the list of top 200 Management college by Business Today. Check the ranking of other MBA colleges in India.
